originalText.text: My oldest daughter is 23 and Vanessa took care of my hair back then, now almost 16 years later her staff Magdalena (who is wonderful at doing hair and so sweet)is taking care of my 8yr old's hair. I recently had a stroke and my daughter's hair is super thick, I took her to get braids then I had to wait for her sis or someone to take them out.I can't because my right hand is disabled because of the stroke. her hair was growing but those edges were thinning out Chile not Cute!!! So I decided what was best for my child was a mild children's relaxer and deep conditions. I'm able to wrap her hair nicely every night and she loves getting a wash & set every 2-3 weeks. This may not be for you but it's old school working wonders for her hair.  BTW my daughter loves her hair,  she hated those pretty braids which was torture on her getting them put it & take out. I'm sooo greatly appreciative Vanessa is still open to help me care for my baby's hair. Thank you guys so much, I love you Yvonne & Yasmin xoxoxo

originalText.text: Vanessa did a great job and worked fast. I wanted my shoulder length hair cut in a bob and she worked efficiently. I am very happy with the results and the price was fair. Cash only but there is an ATM in the shop.

text.text: Vanessa did a great job and worked fast. I wanted my shoulder length hair cut in a bob and she worked efficiently. I am very happy with the results and the price was fair. Cash only but there is an ATM in the shop.

originalText.text: THIS PLACE IS AWESOME...VANESSA IS THE BEST AND HER DAUGHTER FLO CAN DO SOME HAIR...I WENT HERE GROWING UP AND NOW MY KIDS GO HERE.....NEVER A DISAPPOINTMENT

originalText.text: She did a great job! Fast service and friendly and professional

text.text: She did a great job! Fast service and friendly and professional

originalText.text: I use to love them when I use to get my hair done by them years ago. I took my 9yr old there who has really thick coiled hair. All I asked for her was a hot oil treatment, with blow and flat iron. Fast forward a week when it's time for me to wash her hair. Soon as I wet it you can smell the chemicals oozing out her hair. It smelled like straight perm! Mind you her hair is naturally coiled up. My baby's poor natural curls are gone. Her  hair is super straight smh. Never again will we go back! I called and spoke with the husband and said yall put perm in the shampoo. Of course he denied it and told me bring her in. I'm not traveling damn near 2hrs just for them to lie and deny in my face!
